reformulated1: What are the most effective strategies for targeting lipid nanoparticles (LNPs) specifically to liver sinusoidal endothelial cells (LSECs) rather than hepatocytes?
reformulated2: How does modifying the size and surface charge of LNPs influence their uptake by Kupffer cells versus other liver cell populations?
reformulated3: What impact does cholesterol removal or oxidation in LNP formulations have on their hepatic accumulation and cell specificity within the liver?
